contest-event.event-date:
June 7, 1924 D Marsden Contest
Marsden Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
marsden-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
William Tell [arr. Rimmer]
Ing Lees Park, Marsden Promoted by Marsden Brass Band. Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £5. March: (Sons of the Wild) - 1. Friendly, 2. Carlton, 3. Hinchliffe Mill. 8 bands competed.
April 4, 2014, 8:30 p.m. Feb. 17, 2021, 4:38 p.m.
1 Friendly Band (Sowerby Bridge) Joseph Crawford Dyson
2 Carlton Main Frickley Colliery Band Noel Thorpe
3 Dobcross Silver Band J. Jennings
4 Hinchliffe Mill Band Noel Thorpe
Unknown Result Lindley Band J. Jennings
Unknown Result Linthwaite Silver Band Tom Eastwood
Unknown Result Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Joseph Crawford Dyson
Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Joseph Crawford Dyson
